website_summaries.verdict: Versions of this food aimed at small breed and large breed puppies. Promotes maintaining a healthy weight.
pros: Includes calcium for healthy bone growth
Customers report high quality development of the puppy's coat while on this food
cons: Owners say food will take on rancid smell if stored too long
Puppies with sensitive stomachs may struggle with this food

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This is the food I feed my frenchie. Small kibble that PERFECT for small breed puppies. I had a micro teacup chihuahua a few yrs that weighed 2lbs fully grown and I wish I would've know about this food when she was a puppy. I saw this food at my nearby PetCo for 15.99, SAME SIZE, I hopped on Amazon, 10 bucks n change, complete no brainer ESPECIALLY with the subscription. Just got my second bag 3 days ago. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Miranduh

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Very Hesitant
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has been on this good since I got her, almost a year, and this is the first bag I purchased from Amazon. She didn’t seem to like it at all. Not sure what the issue was but she never does that when I get it from the pet store. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: ErrinM

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie, who I will admit is a very picky eater, has been even more reluctant to eat on this bag of food. She has had very soft poop and has been having “problems” that have required two baths in the last four days. She has also been throwing up almost every day too, just watery yellow but still. I hate to waste food so I’ll be feeding the rest of the bag to my chickens who will eat literally anything.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: He likes it, but so do my other animals
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper at Walmart. So far what I can report is that puppy loves this food. The kibble is tiny so it's easy for him to chew. The unfortunate thing is that I have other dogs and cats and they love it too. That is saying something since prior to switching to Nutro we were feeding the puppy iams. He didn't much care for it nor did any of the other animals. His stool is solid and big for his size so the food is performing properly.
customer_reviews.author: Got it here.

customer_reviews.title: Great food, vet approved
customer_reviews.text: The only dry I will feed my Chichuahuas. Currently 9 week old just started. My other boy (a rescue) eats only Nutro Ultra and the toy brown rice, chicken and sweet potato version.
customer_reviews.author: DMW

customer_reviews.title: My dog smelled this and went crazy
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. I was holding my puppy when I opened it and he smelled it and went crazy. He ate more than I've seen him eat since I got him. I mixed this with his old food at the direction of the breeder. I know it was this food because he never acted that way over the food they had been giving him. This gets 5 stars from me and Stinger. How his body will react remains to be seen but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Toya

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.text: My picky chihuahua mix loves it. She is so dang picky that I get stressed out trying to find food that she'll actually touch. The small size is a major plus and it's one of the main reasons why I bought it. Good quality ingredients. Made in the USA. My dog loves it. What more can I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Bad lots?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag that I have gotten through the subscription service and both have made my dog sick (having to go to the bathroom all the time). He was fine as soon as I switched him off of those bags. I’ve used this brand my dog’s whole life (7 years) and always been happy with it. Maybe there are some bad batches?
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: The only food for our Boston terriers!
customer_reviews.text: We love this dog food for our pups! It’s been the only food that their sensitive stomachs can handle! They are also really picky about flavors but they love this flavor. The ingredients are high quality and the price is very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Wells

customer_reviews.title: GREAT small pieces for small puppies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great food for small puppies! We got what they think was the runt or twin runt pug puppy, she was 7 or 8 weeks ago but still looking for milk and whining when eating. We switched her to this and she had no issues, we think the bigger puppy food they were giving her hurt her mouth. We love this brand and especially the small breed line!
customer_reviews.author: TiffieB123

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Although my pup seemed to like the food, she had terrible diarrhea from it. I changed her food to what the vet suggested and the problem went away.
customer_reviews.author: marylisa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: My 10 lb toy poodle mix puppy liked this for about two weeks and then quickly got bored. The size and shape of the food didn’t make her chew them very much but she seemed fine. Her stools and behavior were also normal!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It was highly recommended by several people and I’m glad I switched to ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying several brands (started with Orijens and then went to Acana) and seeing my golden doodle reject her food, I tried this and voila, suddenly my puppy is eating. She loves this food. It was highly recommended by several people and I’m glad I switched to this. We got a second puppy a few weeks ago and she loves this food too. We are customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: Charu

customer_reviews.title: They loved it, and their mother was relieved not to ...
customer_reviews.text: Started the pups on this at 3 weeks by grinding it up in the food processor with hot milk. They loved it, and their mother was relieved not to have to constantly nurse seven huge puppers. No farts, no weird poops from transitioning to solid food. Excellent. I wish it was still on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Fellner

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY PUP, HAPPY WALLET!
customer_reviews.text: Love this puppy food and so does my chihuahua! So convenient to just order it here because every time I try to purchase it in store, the are either out of stock or too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: jaz

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: It's all my fur baby eats, shinny coat, happy and healthy
customer_reviews.author: norma gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My puppies love this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad this was recommended to me recently. I have tiny white poms and the food is good for them and is the right size for little puppy mouths. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Missy's momie

customer_reviews.title: Great small breed puppy food.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved this food. Her vet approved. Now that she's a few months older, she has changed to a product my other dog has been using. It was hard to find small breed puppy food.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Possible health issue
customer_reviews.text: Will throw away since product is on list for possible health issue for dogs, not taking any chances
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I only feed my Yorkie and Maltese this food and a specific wet food once a day. They LOVE this food. It’s good for red tears and dogs with allergies. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenocidal

customer_reviews.title: Great for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: Love the small little niblets. Our small breed dog doesn't have much for teeth. We put a little water on it to soften it and she gobbles it right up. Price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Paula - Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. She eats about 1 cup per day.Everyone comments on how healthy she looks....has even lost a few pounds. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D. Veneris

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good dog food but puppy gets bored with flavor too quick. Prefers other dog’s food.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products don't know what's in there but my dog loves it brings me his bowl for seconds😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: DONNA STAGGS

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog really loves this food. To me, it is a little over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Drizzling Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Puppy likes it
customer_reviews.text: Great for my puppy who has a sensitive tummy. Small peices make it easy for him to eat with his tiny teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Food
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves it and you have amazing prices!!!! Will be making all future purchases with you.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Frost

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients look good for my beloved pet
customer_reviews.text: How can I review this? I don't eat it. The ingredients look good for my beloved pet. Said pet eats it without complaint.So five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Agave

customer_reviews.title: My beagle loves this good as soon as I grab her bowl she jumps ...
customer_reviews.text: My beagle loves this, as soon as I grab her bowl she jumps for it. It is a little pricey but at least you know your dog is eating actually meat and not just fillers
customer_reviews.author: Mady

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves it and that's more important to me. It's always here on time and that's more than what I could ask for. I noticed a spike in energy after my puppy started eating this.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Makes dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dog food on the recommendation of Dog Food Adviser. After 2 days of eating this my husky/malamute puppy got extreme diahrrea and lost her appetite. Now I'm going to have to throw a $35 bag of dog food away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My rescue has never eaten any thing else. No diarrhea, no problem? Why change?
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: My puppy won’t touch it
customer_reviews.text: It’s been two days, my puppy won’t eat this at all. She smelt the food and walked away, I had to change the food.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Wolfs it down
customer_reviews.text: Pieces are still pretty small for a pup who wolfs down her food, but she loves it. I'm getting a special dish to slow her down.
customer_reviews.author: jaydee

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food! Great ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food!!!! It has made her coat shiny and never upsets her stomach. She seems to be really healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Our Shiffon has done very well with this diet. Reasonable price and high quality. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Keevill

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it and I love that I know they're getting great nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite brand. We have used exclusively for our dogs and foster dogs for 4 years and we have never had a problem getting them to eat it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: One of them is a senior dog and they both do good with this food
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this food for my Chihuahua and Yorkie. One of them is a senior dog and they both do good with this food. I like mixing the wet with it too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: ... and it is rated high by AKC as a good nutritional dog food
customer_reviews.text: My Havanese puppy likes the taste and it is rated high by AKC as a good nutritional dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Pamila Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding this to my puppy since he was able to eat solid food. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: StephBia

customer_reviews.title: This is a convenient way to buy it and it's a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Can't always find this at pet store. This is a convenient way to buy it and it's a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Definitely something for you fur baby
customer_reviews.text: My puppy 🐶 loves this dog food and their treats and it’s really good for tour dogs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KConley

customer_reviews.title: Watch when opening.
customer_reviews.text: We received our order today. Have not used this batch however it was open in the box and there were ants all over inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was expected! Great food for large breed puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Anne DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: My puppy is a happy puppy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Gray

customer_reviews.title: dangerous - not real product
customer_reviews.text: Contents inside differ from bags bought in stores. This made my puppy very sick.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: and I'm glad we did
customer_reviews.text: We have a 3 month old Cockapoo. The breeder suggested we try Nutro, and I'm glad we did! He loves his food, and no stomach issues with it. Can't beat the pricing and shipment deal on Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Good food for my puppy..
customer_reviews.text: My Lab loves this puppy food. We will continue to order Nutro.. very pleased..
customer_reviews.author: RitaAuwarter

customer_reviews.title: This is great product, no issues at all with my pup
customer_reviews.text: This is great product, no issues at all with my pup. Fast delivery and cheaper then buying it at the pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my growing pup!
customer_reviews.text: This is the food my vet recommended as the best quality nutrition for my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for my puppy to eat
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for my puppy to eat, I was not sure if she were ready for hard food or not, but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tontay K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My puppy doesn't like this food at all
customer_reviews.text: My puppy doesn't like this food at all. She starves and then eats it. But later she suffers from stomach issue and loose stool issue. Is there any way i can get a refund. I have same kind of food with brand Authority. She likes it very much and she feels great. If anyone is having issue with this brand, try Authority.
customer_reviews.author: Anwarul Abedin

customer_reviews.title: causes diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: zero stars. made my puppy sick. check consumer reporting websites and see the many claims of vomiting and diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Stac

product_meta.title: NUTRO WHOLESOME ESSENTIALS Puppy Dry Dog Food, All Breed Sizes
product_meta.description: Style:Small Breed Puppy| Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:5 lbs.NUTRO WHOLESOME ESSENTIALS Natural Small Breed Puppy Farm-Raised Chicken, Brown Rice & Sweet Potato Recipe Dog Food always starts with great-tasting, farm-raised chicken and contains a unique blend of whole grains, vegetables and fruit. This natural dog food provides tailored nutrition for your small breed's unique needs and is made with Omega 3 fatty acids like DHA for healthy growth and development for your puppy, plus vitamins, minerals and other nutrients. These recipes are also crafted with Omega 3 & 6 fatty acids, to promote healthy skin and a soft, shiny coat and calcium to build strong bones and joints. NUTRO Food for Dogs follows the THE NUTRO FEED CLEAN philosophy, is always made with Non-GMO Ingredients and is made with no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. *Trace amounts of genetically modified material may be present due to potential cross contact during manufacturing.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 5-lb. bag of NUTRO WHOLESOME ESSENTIALS Natural Small Breed Puppy Farm-Raised Chicken, Brown Rice & Sweet Potato Recipe Dog Food; Natural Dog Food Plus Vitamins, Minerals and Other Nutrients
Tailored Nutrition For Your Small Breed'S Unique Needs
This Nutro Dog Food Is Formulated With Omega-3 Fatty Acids Like Dha To Promote Healthy Growth And Development
Made With Calcium To Build Strong Bones And Joints
Made With Non-Gmo Ingredients, Trace Amounts Of Genetically Modified Material May Be Present Due To Potential Cross Contact During Manufacturing
